body.p:
Hawesville Ky Sept 21th 1861
To His Excelency. B Magoffin Govenor of Ky and commander in chief of the forces of Ky

The Members of the company of the State Guard known as the Hancock Riffes,, of which I am first Lieutenant having failed to take the oath required by the second Section of an Act entitled "an act to amend an act for the better organisation of the Militia" approved 24th May 1861 and the company ^having^ their by become disbanded. I have the honor to tender to your Exelency this my resignation of the office of 1st Lieutenant of Said company

I have the honor to be your Ecellencies obedient Servant
Saml, G, Hughes

Recommended to be Accepted
By Order
Genl. T. L. Crittenden
By Geo. W. Monroe
Aid de Camp
accepted
B. Magoffin
Com in chief-
